column1: ReShare uses an item's location and type to determine E-ZBorrow requestability. An item must be BOTH stored in a lendable location AND be of a lendable type in order to be requested via E-ZBorrow.
Please list your library's lendable locations and item types to indicate which materials you will sharing via E-ZBorrow.

column3: All other locations are not lendable
column4: All other types are not lendable
